PVT.PR.summary: RMS Mezzanine, a.s. provides capital to small-and medium-sized companies. The company offers mezzanine funding. It also invests in companies, such as energy, service, health care, telecommunications/media, retail, construction/real estate, and production enterprises. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Prague, the Czech Republic. RMS Mezzanine, a.s. operates as a subsidiary of Simfax Trading Limited.
